Do values in a numeric vector fall in specified range?

Source: R/between.R
between.Rd

This is a shortcut for x >= left & x <= right.

between(x, left, right)

Arguments

x

A numeric vector of values.

left, right

Boundary values.

Value

A logical vector the same length as x.

Examples

between(1:12, 7, 9)
#>  [1] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE

x <- rnorm(1e2)
x[between(x, -1, 1)]
#>  [1]  0.43572699  0.97897852 -0.51117439  0.94357057  0.53181826  0.56926219
#>  [7]  0.29373014 -0.33525430  0.36926307  0.13717574 -0.49156128 -0.37984640
